text: 3.23: Wkp 23.29Mba Fhe Bakɨme kamthooŋ guma nzuai buni mbararagi fhuv gumgi, mbe mba Isreriŋ gumgi gu mbigi phorgɨ kegɨrga tuktɨgi fhuvara, mbe vhɨzgirga.’ 3.23 Fhe Bakɨme kamthooŋ guma suaŋgi buni, Fhe Bakɨme nta sararim, nta zɨrga. Mba buni kha gavar ki, mba gava zɨ khare, Lo. Ndu Lo sapta 18.19 ganɨ. Pita khaŋ nzuai, Zisasra mba Fhe Bakɨmen kamthooŋ guma ma.
